title: MacBook Pro delayed for stock and custom builds until July, including existing orders from February
content:
The new MacBook Pro has been a big hit and availability has been mostly consistent (outside of the initial launch rush). However, this week we’ve seen orders for both the stock models and custom builds slip until as far as July, even for some customers who placed orders back in February.

more…
